General.Name: Guangzhou Risong Intelligent Technology Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou Risong Intelligent Technology Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of robots, industrial software, and intelligent manufacturing solutions in China and internationally. It offers industrial robots, intelligent welding, machine vison, and 3C automation equipments in the automotive, two-wheeler, machinery, 3C, elevator, and other industries. Guangzhou Risong Intelligent Technology Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
